title: Final Plot - The plot which is reconstituted or reshaped from the Original Plot within a draft / sanctioned Improvement Scheme in a manner appropriate for development and given access from the public right of way
clause_text: Final Plot - The plot which is reconstituted or reshaped from the Original Plot within a draft / sanctioned Improvement Scheme in a manner appropriate for development and given access from the public right of way. The Final Plots is reconstituted as per the relevant regulations / Act as Final plots for Authorities share and owners share.
section: Special Regulations for the Improvement Schemes :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
